name: FINLAND
description:
THIS IS THE FIRST PART OF A SERIES ABOUT FLAGS IF THEY WERE LEVELS

IN FINLAND, YOU CAN WALK SAFELY ON SNOW BUT DROWN IN WATER

YOU SEE FISH IN THE SEA BUT YOU CANT GET TO THE VITAL FOOD

LUCKILY THERE ARE STICKS THAT CAN BE USED TO MAKE STUFF

LIKE BOATS, WHICH ALLOW YOU TO GO THROUGH WATER AND COLLECT FISH

BUT RAW FISH ISNT THAT GOOD AND SO YOU MUST COOK THE FISH

YOU CAN MAKE FIRE OUT OF STICKS TO COOK THINGS, LIKE FISH OR... YOURSELF

YOU CAN THEN EAT THE FISH AND LIVE TO THE NEXT DAY
